Description_lang: Restore health to an ally and grant them a Ward of Salvation for $444622d.While Ward of Salvation persists, the caster's healing grants absorb in addition to healing.When the Ward expires, it explodes inflicting Holy damage equal to the remaining absorb to all enemies within $444628A1 yards, split evenly.
AuraDescription_lang: $@spellaura444693Healing taken from $@auracaster is added to the absorb shield.
